vote.title: To Proclaim December 6th-8th as GalaxyCon Columbus Days
vote.description:
Title
 
To Proclaim December 6th-8th as GalaxyCon Columbus Days
 
 
Body
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus is honored to host GalaxyCon Columbus, a premier pop culture convention that celebrates fandoms, creativity and community, bringing together thousands of attendees from December 6-8, 2024, at the Greater Columbus Convention Center; and
WHEREAS, GalaxyCon is the largest independently owned consumer and fan engagement company, known for its dynamic programming, celebrity appearances and inclusive celebration of all things fandom, attracting visitors of all ages and interests; and
WHEREAS, the 2024 event will feature an exciting array of celebrity guests, including Hayden Christensen, “Weird Al” Yankovic, George Takei, and cast reunions from fan-favorite shows and films such as Star Wars, Ted Lasso, Psych, Cobra Kai, and more; and
WHEREAS, attendees will enjoy a variety of unique experiences, including cosplay competitions, gaming tournaments, engaging workshops, late-night parties, and Fantasy Super Cosplay Wrestling (FSCW), ensuring a vibrant and unforgettable weekend; and
WHEREAS, GalaxyCon has made a significant economic impact on Columbus, generating nearly $6 million in direct visitor spending over the past year and highlighting the city as a leading destination for major fan-driven events; and
WHEREAS, events like GalaxyCon demonstrate Columbus’ ability to host large-scale conventions, celebrate creativity, and connect diverse communities, furthering its reputation as a hub for culture, entertainment and innovation; and
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus recognizes the efforts of GalaxyCon’s organizers, volunteers and local businesses in making this event a success and appreciates the opportunity to showcase Columbus’ hospitality and vibrant cultural scene to attendees;
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby proclaim December 6-8, 2024, as GalaxyCon Columbus Days in the City of Columbus and encourage all residents and visitors to participate in the exciting events and activities.
